title: Love♡Training: Renai Taishitsu Kaizen Kouza
original_name: ラブ ♡ トレ ～恋愛体質改善講座～
sinopse:
Iroha Imaichi is a 29-year old graphic designed troubled by her cheating boyfriend. She's always being supported by the hot advice columnist Tamon. She finally breaks up with her boyfriend at his advice. Seeing how depressed Iroha is, her friend Keiko sets her up with Tamon...

(Source: Clairparfait)
